articles.title: 'I always get compliments when I wear this $10 lip oil.'
articles.author: Amy Clark
articles.summary: NYX has launched the Fat Oil Lip Drip, a lip oil combining the shine of a lip gloss, the moisture of a lip oil, and the colour of a lip stain. The author recommends the Newsfeed shade and praises the large doe-foot applicator, its non-sticky texture, and hydrating quality, calling it the ultimate everyday lip product.

articles.title: 10-Minute Daily AI Mastery: Crafting Content, Not Assisting Virtually
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: AI tools like Jasper.ai, Copy.ai, Rytr, Surfer SEO, Scalenut, ChatGPT, and Gemini are introduced for content creation. These tools can generate headlines, outlines, and drafts, increasing productivity and overcoming writer's block. Netflix also uses Generative AI in Argentine TV Series 'la Firma'.

articles.title: Viral claim about Tesla's $789 Pi phone sparks debate, but is it real?
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Tesla is rumored to be launching the 'Model Pi' or 'Tesla Pi Phone' smartphone. This phone allegedly features free Starlink internet, solar charging, and advanced encryption, with a suggested price of $789.

articles.title: Huawei Phones & Google: Instagram, WhatsApp Still Work?
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Huawei, facing restrictions on Google Mobile Services, developed HarmonyOS and the AppGallery. The AppGallery has seen a 48% increase in app downloads year-over-year, indicating user adoption. This challenges the traditional app store model and presents opportunities for developers to reach wider audiences through alternative ecosystems and progressive web apps.

articles.title: Japanese instant curry promises flavor of day-old curry right away, and that's a very good thing
articles.author: Casey Baseel
articles.summary: Ashita no Curry, a Japanese instant curry brand, promises the flavor of day-old curry immediately. Priced at 398 yen, it features large slices of potato, carrot, and pork and is available for purchase through Amazon Japan. Taste tests indicate the curry has a deep, rich flavor, exceeding the depth of flavor found in actual day-old curry.

articles.title: Mornglow Launches Niacinamide whitening Toothpaste Focused on Soothing Sensitivity and Gum Care
articles.summary: Mornglow has launched its new Niacinamide Whitening Toothpaste, designed to address the issue of tooth sensitivity and gum irritation often associated with whitening products. The toothpaste uses natural ingredients such as papain, carrageenan extract, and coconut oil to gently remove stains and soothe gums while offering a vegan formula with organic peppermint oil, free from preservatives and artificial dyes.

articles.title: An Update Turns The Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 Into A Professional Workhorse
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Samsung updated its Galaxy Z Flip phone with new software and a design update. These updates aim to enhance productivity for busy professionals using the device.

articles.title: The Lookfantastic Grooming Advent Calendar review: Is it really worth £425?
articles.author: Aaron Dowler
articles.summary: Lookfantastic launched the Grooming Advent Calendar, priced at £85 with contents valued over £425. The calendar includes 25 products such as Bulldog Original Shave Gel, ESPA The Hydrator Serum, and Vichy Minéral 89 72Hr Hyaluronic Acid and Squalane Moisture Boosting Cream. The Grooming Advent Calendar is intended for those new to grooming or skincare, providing a comprehensive routine.

articles.title: Vaping 101: What Every Lifestyle Enthusiast Should Know
articles.author: Jack Garrison
articles.summary: Vapestore is an established retailer that offers a comprehensive product range of vaping products. Vapestore also provides expert advice to meet all your vaping needs.

articles.title: 9 Reasons Why Busy You NEED This Powerful No-Scrub Stain Remover
articles.summary: Campanelli introduces the Campanelli Pro Series Point & Spray Stain Remover, a professional-grade aerosol stain remover designed for easy and effective stain removal. This product eliminates the need for scrubbing and is capable of removing set-in stains, offering a convenient solution for busy families. It's available on the brand's official website with a 55-day money-back guarantee and free shipping on orders over $55.

articles.title: Microsoft will compete with AWS to offer a marketplace of AI apps and agents
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Microsoft Cloud introduces a new AI platform. This platform allows customers to quickly implement new AI tools with enhanced security features.

articles.title: KSDL Partners With Kantara Film Team To Expand Its Consumer Reach
articles.author: M B Girish
articles.summary: Karnataka Soaps and Detergents Limited (KSDL) has partnered with Hombale Films' 'Kantara-Chapter 1' to promote KSDL products at screenings of the movie, aiming to expand its reach. KSDL is the fragrance partner and co-sponsor for the film, with plans to release the movie on thousands of screens across multiple countries and languages. The collaboration is part of KSDL's effort to expand its global market through enhanced branding and promotion.

articles.title: Top Amazon Canada Products That Are Actually Useful
articles.author: May Ning
articles.summary: Affresh introduces washer cleaning tablets to eliminate mildew odors and improve appliance performance. A leave-in spray is introduced by BuzzFeed that detangles, heat-protects, and keeps hair silky. Scrub Mommy sponge that's the levelled-up spouse of the popular Scrub Daddy sponge. Pet House spray introduces a room-freshening spray designed for pet owners to neutralize animal odors without irritation. FryAway introduces a packet that solidifies leftover cooking oil for easy disposal.

articles.title: Prime Day is Almost a Week Away, But You Can Shop These Early Beauty Deals Now — Over 50% Off
articles.author: Madison San Miguel
articles.summary: Several beauty products are highlighted, including a makeup sponge pack, an under-eye cream containing caffeine and retinol, and zodiac-inspired hair brushes designed to prevent breakage. Also featured are cozy memory foam slippers and the Ouidad Advanced Climate Control Styling Cream for lasting curls. The article also mentions a gel nail polish kit with 20 colors and a red-light therapy device for acne treatment. A moisturizing facial cream duo and various hair styling tools like a curling iron and a 3-in-1 styling tool are also spotlighted.

articles.title: Meta unveils ad-free Facebook and Instagram for UK users
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: Instagram launched new subscriber features. The feature represents a new service offering from the company.

articles.title: Innovative ZipTowel Disrupts Laundry Routine with Smart Design from Single Mom Entrepreneur
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: The creator has developed ZipTowel, a household product designed to benefit busy individuals. This product has garnered attention from Shark Tank producers.

articles.title: Bissell's top handheld cleaner for 'tough stains' is on rare sale at Amazon
articles.author: Kyley Warren
articles.summary: Amazon is offering an early Prime Day deal on the Bissell Steam Shot Handheld Portable Cleaner. The handheld steamer is designed to clean tough grime and stains on hard surfaces like grout and tile and is on sale at Amazon for under $40. Amazon's October Prime Day sale will run from Tuesday, October 7 to Wednesday, October 8.

articles.title: A Decade of Anticipation: Celebrating 6 Years of a Game That Delivered on Every Promise
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Team Cherry has launched Hollow Knight: Silksong, a Metroidvania game and sequel to Hollow Knight. The game features Hornet as the main character, who explores the kingdom of Pharloom. It is available on PC, Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X/S, and PlayStation 4/5.

articles.title: Tyra Banks Invented a New Dessert
articles.author: Olivia Craighead
articles.summary: Tyra Banks' company, Smize and Dream, has launched a new product called 'hot ice cream'. This product transforms the company's ice cream scoops into a sippable, hot liquid form, specifically focusing on the flavor 'Tyra's Favorite'. It's available at their flagship store in Sydney.

articles.title: UAE highlights AI innovation with multi-tasking robot in China
articles.author: Sharjah 24
articles.summary: Legend Holding Group has developed a multi-functional robot designed for security, firefighting, product delivery, and customer service. One unit has already been delivered to the UAE, with broader deployment planned for 2026 after service programming is finalized. The robot impressed visitors with its agility, interactive abilities, and multilingual communication.

articles.title: Edge Computing, WebAssembly, and Instant Loading - What's Next According to Digital Silk Web Development Company
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Digital Silk has released insights on the future of web development, focusing on edge computing, WebAssembly, and instant-loading experiences. These technologies are shaping digital platforms in 2025 by prioritizing speed, efficiency, and responsiveness. The company's insights suggest that edge computing, WebAssembly, instant loading, and performance+security are driving the evolution of development.

articles.title: I've Tested Countless Curl Care Products – These Are My All-Time Favourites
articles.summary: The article recommends several hair care products for curly hair, including a styling custard for firm hold, the Tangle Teezer detangling brush, a gentle and hydrating curl shampoo, and a glycolic acid treatment to boost hair strength and shine.

articles.title: No Bluetooth speaker I've tested delivers bass and mids like this one
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Brane X is a new portable speaker. It delivers immersive sound and offers useful customization features.

articles.title: OnePlus will give you a free smartwatch right now - here's how the deal works
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: OnePlus is promoting the OnePlus 13 phone, highlighting its performance and offering a free gift with purchase. The phone features a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.

articles.title: Blink Video Doorbell 2 review: The budget video doorbell of choice
articles.author: Christopher Hall
articles.summary: Blink launched its second-generation Video Doorbell in 2025, an affordable home security option. The Blink Video Doorbell 2 includes features like phone notifications, live view, and two-way audio, and improvements include a wider lens and Sync Module Core. The doorbell is priced at £59.99.

articles.title: Elon Musk Hails Grok Vision After Netizens Claim It Runs Smoothly Across iOS and Android — But How Does It Actually Work?
articles.author: Vinay Patel
articles.summary: xAI introduced Grok Vision to its Grok chatbot, enabling it to process visual information. The updated chatbot analyzes images and videos, identifying products and suggesting uses. Elon Musk predicts that Grok 5 could achieve artificial general intelligence.

articles.title: Aldi Just Made This Long-Awaited Change—and Shoppers Are Thrilled
articles.author: Michele Laufik
articles.summary: Aldi is rebranding its store-brand products with new packaging, brighter colors, and clearer product descriptions, and will feature either the Aldi brand name or 'an Aldi Original' label. Some brands like Baker's Corner and Dakota's Pride will be integrated into the Aldi brand, while others like Clancy's, Simply Nature, and Specially Selected will be endorsed as 'an Aldi Original'.

articles.title: Which iPhone 17 Model Should You Buy?
articles.author: Luke Guillory
articles.summary: Apple has launched three new iPhone models: the iPhone 17 Air, a lightweight and durable model for the tech-savvy; the iPhone 17 Pro, a high-performance model with advanced cooling and camera capabilities and the iPhone 17, a base model with good value and improved features. The iPhone 17 Air features a new design, while the iPhone 17 Pro offers significant performance upgrades.

articles.title: 30,000 Amazon shoppers can't be wrong about this NOCO car battery jump starter — and now it's on sale
articles.author: Dawn Magyar
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the NOCO Boost GB40 Car Battery Jump Starter at a discounted price of $100, a 20% savings from its original price of $125. This jump starter features a 1,000 amp output, suitable for 12V batteries in vehicles with up to 6.0L gas and 3.0L diesel engines and can also be used as a power bank.

articles.title: What is ChatGPT Agent and how to use it?
articles.author: Daniel Tison
articles.summary: OpenAI introduced ChatGPT Agent, a new feature designed to assist with online tasks via a virtual computer. This feature is available on Pro, Plus, Business, Enterprise, and Edu subscription plans, offering capabilities such as file handling, third-party app connections, and website interaction. ChatGPT Agent can be accessed on web and mobile apps, supporting natural conversation for task completion.

articles.title: GFX Brokers launches 'Kojo', Africa's smart Eurobond sales chat agent
articles.summary: GFX Brokers has launched 'Kojo', a new conversational Eurobond Sales agent powered by Salesforce Agentforce and developed in collaboration with Evolf. This service enables real-time access to financial information and end-to-end trading interactions via WhatsApp, improving client engagement in the SSA Eurobond market.

articles.title: ABD Maestro Pioneers Generative AI in Alco-Bev Marketing with India's First Consumer Engagement Initiative
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: ABD Maestro is launching India's first generative AI-led consumer engagement initiative, showcased through ZOYA Gin and WOODBURNS Whisky. ZOYA Gin features AI-generated Value Added Packs and collaboration with AI influencer Kavya Mehra. WOODBURNS Whisky is partnering with AI influencer Kabir Manja for immersive storytelling.

articles.title: Dyson V16 Piston Animal vacuum cleaner review: It's expensive but Dyson's next level anti-tangle tech blew me away
articles.author: DANIELLE AMATO
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the V16 Piston Animal, a new cordless vacuum cleaner featuring advanced anti-tangle technology, a dust compactor, and a laser light. The V16 Piston Animal boasts 315 air watts of suction and a 70-minute run time and is positioned as Dyson's most advanced cordless vacuum. It includes a Hair Screw 2.0 tool for cleaning smaller areas, a crevice tool, a combination tool, and a wall mount.

articles.title: FMI becomes Sour Supplier by FMI: The Power of Sour
articles.summary: Fruit Market International (FMI) rebranded as Sour Supplier by FMI on September 26, launching a new visual identity. The company aims to strengthen its profile within the sour produce category, including limes, lemons, ginger, and turmeric, and surprise producers and retailers.

articles.title: IKEA's $3 Dish Drying Mat Protects Counters From Drips and Scratches
articles.author: Fred Hernandez
articles.summary: IKEA has introduced the NYSKÖLJD dish drying mat, a $2.99 padded mat designed to absorb water, protect surfaces, and fold away easily. The mat, made from recycled polyester with a foam core, provides a cushioned surface for drying dishes and can be used in various other applications, such as under coffee makers or pet bowls.

articles.title: 14 Truck Accessories Worth Picking Up Before Your Next Big Project
articles.author: Annemarije De Boer
articles.summary: Several new products aim to enhance truck functionality and utility. The Ascender Expedition Grade Camper transforms a pickup into a mobile kitchen, capable of handling extreme temperatures and accommodating multiple people. Thule Helium Platform offers a user-friendly bike rack solution with an easy locking system, while LEER Truck Caps provide versatile covers and camper shells, turning pickups into mobile kitchens and workstations.

articles.title: HP OmniBook X Flip 14 review: A jack of all trades
articles.summary: HP has launched the OmniBook X Flip 14, a 2-in-1 laptop featuring a 360-degree hinge, 14-inch OLED touchscreen, and Intel's Core Ultra 7 processor. The laptop comes with an active stylus and is targeted towards students and professionals who prioritize productivity and media consumption. However, the battery life and graphics performance are average.

articles.title: BMW's New 6-Cylinder Internal Combustion Engine Set to Debut: Latest Insights from Fakti.bg
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: BMW is set to unveil a redesigned Series 3 sedan based on the 'Neue Klasse' architecture, featuring gasoline, hybrid, and all-electric (i3) powertrain options. The exterior will draw from the Vision Neue Klasse concept with a minimalist interior including a 17.9-inch display. The unveiling is expected later this year, with the electric i3 model arriving in early 2026 as a 2027 model, and production slated to begin in late 2026.

articles.title: Seattle's Tin Can reinvents the landline phone for kids
articles.author: Nicole Pasia
articles.summary: Tin Can, a Seattle-based startup, launched a phone system for kids designed to resemble the classic landline. Priced at $75, the Tin Can Flashback phone uses a wired internet connection, while another model connects wirelessly to Wi-Fi, and requires a $9.99 per month phone plan to support calls to external numbers. The goal is to provide children with a safe and screen-free way to communicate with parent-approved contacts.

articles.title: Pourquoi le prince William et le roi Charles se retrouvent à Balmoral pour la 3e année consécutive
articles.author: Olivia Batoul
articles.summary: An apparel company is promoting its new line of high-end baby clothes. They are working with an agency to identify and target profiles of wealthy young parents to present advertising for the new product line within partner apps.

articles.title: Swish Secures Seed Funding from Leading Retail Tech Investors to Revolutionize CPG Product Sampling
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Swish, a company specializing in programmatic product trials, has launched a service that delivers full-size CPG product samples to consumers through their regular grocery shopping orders. The platform utilizes proprietary AI and real transactional data to personalize the experience and measure purchase behavior. This approach aims to make product discovery a seamless part of the shopping journey.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 price drops to lowest: 4 reasons to buy, 1 to skip
articles.summary: The OnePlus Nord 5 is available at a discounted price of Rs 28,499, featuring a Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset, a 6,800 mAh battery with 80W fast charging, and a 6.74-inch 120Hz AMOLED display. It ships with OxygenOS 15 based on Android 15, with promised long-term software support.  The Nord 5 improves on its predecessor, the Nord 4, with a larger battery.

articles.title: Let's Talk About Sex: Why More Black Women Are Exploring Tech-Enhanced Pleasure
articles.author: Jasmine Elise
articles.summary: The We Vibe Chorus vibrator features a squeezable remote and custom app for remote control. The Kuirkish g-spot vibrator uses an AI-powered C9 chip to synchronize vibrations with adult videos. These products exemplify the evolution of sex tech, which is aimed to enhance intimacy and pleasure through technological advancements.

articles.title: Verizon is still giving away the iPhone 17 Pro for free right now - here's ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Verizon is offering new and current customers up to $1,100 off any of the new iPhone 17 phones. Furthermore, Verizon is providing some free Apple Watch and iPad offers.

articles.title: Ditch your ironing board for highly-rated Asda gadget – and it's currently on sale
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: Asda offers the 'Blue Garment Steamer' for £13.93, reduced from £20, featuring continuous steam and a garment brush and Lidl provides an unnamed product to dry 2 loads of washing in a couple of hours and it is £20 cheaper than on Amazon. These products aim to efficiently remove creases from garments and speed up the laundry process.

articles.title: Blaze Pizza to mark new Linden restaurant with free pies
articles.author: Kimberly Redmond
articles.summary: Blaze Pizza launched a new restaurant in Linden, New Jersey, on Sept. 30, celebrating with free pizza for the first 50 people and a free 11-inch pizza for all guests that day. The new location is part of a multi-unit agreement to develop 10 Blaze Pizza outposts.

articles.title: Creating Infinite Possibilities with Limited Wireless Resources
articles.author: Media Outreach
articles.summary: Huawei introduced AgenticRAN, an AI-powered wireless network architecture. This architecture focuses on effectiveness, reliability, and cost, integrating AI into wireless networks to improve user experience and network value as 5G-A commercialization accelerates.

articles.title: Verizon to offer Meta Ray-Ban Display AI glasses to customers
articles.summary: Verizon will be the first mobile carrier to offer Meta Ray-Ban Display AI glasses to customers. The glasses will be available at select Verizon stores from autumn 2025, and customers can book in-person demonstrations. This launch reflects Verizon's commitment to providing access to the latest technology.

articles.title: Xiaomi launches 17 Pro Max, delivering a familiar name and intriguing features
articles.author: Alvin R Cabral
articles.summary: Xiaomi has launched its new smartphone lineup, the Xiaomi 17 series, including the 17 Pro and 17 Pro Max models. The Xiaomi 17 Pro Max features a 6.9-inch display, three 50MP cameras, a 7500mAh battery, and a Dynamic Back Display, a secondary touchscreen on the rear camera block. The Xiaomi 17 series is priced between $630 to $980.

articles.title: Amazon Web Services CEO Matt Garman has a 'warning' for employees: "The first and very most important thing we've got to do is..."
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is internally testing a new AI agent called 'Quick'. This AI system is designed to analyze documents and automate workflows with minimal prompting, representing AWS's effort to compete in the rapidly evolving AI landscape and a shift in their AI strategy.

articles.title: Telephone listeners for iPhone and Mac-and other USB-C devices
articles.summary: Nomad has launched the Pop Phone, a USB-C headset designed to bring a touch of analog simplicity to modern calls. The Pop Phone is compatible with iPhone 15 and newer, Android devices, MacBooks, and tablets, and is constructed from recycled materials. It is available in eight vibrant colors and priced around €40.

articles.title: Beauty influencers are raving about this moisturiser
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: Dr Sam's Flawless Moisturiser, formulated by Dr Sam Bunting, has garnered attention for its effectiveness and appeal to both dermatologists and beauty influencers. Simple App is offering a 3-month free trial of its Wall Pilates program, designed to help users reshape their bodies with personalized workouts and AI coaching.

articles.title: This $12 'Pint-Sized Powerhouse' Vacuum Is Perfect For Tackling Little Messes Everywhere
articles.summary: Igokoti has launched a mini desk vacuum cleaner designed for small messes. The article also highlights cordless vacuum options from Dyson, Bissell, Black+Decker, Shark, and Roomie Tec, detailing features like suction power, battery life, portability, and specialized designs for pet owners or small spaces.

articles.title: A look at NYT's first-party data program for direct-sold ads that uses its own data and data science techniques, which it says has performed well competitively (Pranay Prabhat/NYT Open)
articles.author: Techmeme
articles.summary: The New York Times launched an advertising data program for its direct-sold ads business. The program utilizes The New York Times' own data and data science techniques. It aims to improve the performance of direct-sold advertisements.

articles.title: OnePlus' latest concept phone is a color-changing, motion-tracking 8T
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: OnePlus is developing a new concept phone called 8T. The phone features color-changing and motion-tracking capabilities.

articles.title: 10 Facts That Are Real But Sound Fake
articles.author: Brian Galindo
articles.summary: Frito-Lay launched Doritos nationally in 1966 after its popularity grew at Disneyland. The chips were originally created as an alternative to Fritos by a local company, Alex Foods, before Frito-Lay recognized their potential and expanded production. The success at Disneyland led to a national launch.

articles.title: AWS Chief Pushes for Faster Product Launches, Warns Staff Against Delays
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is emphasizing speed and execution in product delivery, with Chief Executive Matt Garman urging teams to prioritize launching innovative new things at Reinvent. At last year's Reinvent, the company introduced Nova, a suite of foundation models made available through Amazon Bedrock. Garman also introduced Quick, an agentic AI tool designed to automate workflows, improve productivity and execute tasks with minimal prompting; employees will soon have early access to test the tool.

articles.title: TCL Launches the TAB 8 NXTPAPER 5G
articles.author: Missoulian
articles.summary: A new compact and efficient tablet offers performance for both business and pleasure, designed for on-the-go use. The tablet's versatility makes it suitable for various applications.

articles.title: SNS Network 2Q profit triples to RM20.6mil on record RM1.75bil revenue
articles.summary: SNS Network Technology Bhd launched the SNS AI Factory to support Malaysia's AI transformation. The company also offers GPU-as-a-Service (GPUaaS), powered by NVIDIA Hopper GPUs, enabling enterprises, government agencies, and academic institutions to utilize AI capabilities without substantial initial investment.

articles.title: Amazon's AWS boss chides staff for slow product rollouts: ‘It's valuable if we can actually ...
articles.author: New York Post
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is prioritizing the actual launch of innovative products at its Reinvent event, rather than just pre-announcing them. This is according to a top executive who criticized slow product rollouts.

articles.title: How to Pre-Order Xbox Ally: The Newest Gaming Handheld Revealed
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Microsoft and Asus have launched the pre-order phase for their new gaming handhelds, the Xbox Ally and the Xbox Ally X. Deliveries are scheduled to begin on October 16th. The Xbox Ally model is priced at €599 for German customers, while the upgraded Xbox Ally X is offered at €899, each featuring a newly optimized Windows system designed for gaming.

articles.title: Gavin Newsom Toasts Trump Vodka Return With A Bottle Full Of Burn
articles.author: Lee Moran
articles.summary: Trump Vodka is being relaunched after being dormant since 2011. Eric Trump teased the revival on social media. California Gov. Gavin Newsom also teased a spoof alcohol line called 'Newsom Wine' on social media.

articles.title: Lirik Lagu N the Front Monsta X dan Maknanya yang Mendalam
articles.author: Nadira Lestari Amirah
articles.summary: Monsta X released the song "N the Front" on September 1, 2025. The song is the main track of their comeback mini album titled "The X."

articles.title: Wait reduced as Volvo EX90 gains faster charging upgrades
articles.author: Mark Jones
articles.summary: Volvo has upgraded its EX90 electric vehicle, reducing charging time and increasing range via a new Nvidia Drive AGX chip and improved software. The updated EX90 achieves a range of 250 km after less than 10 minutes of charging. In addition to the charging improvements, Volvo has also integrated an automatic emergency call function and upgraded the Emergency Steering Assist system.

articles.title: OnePlus is giving away free smartwatches if you buy its latest flagship - here's how ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: OnePlus 13 features a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset. Customers who purchase it now will receive a free gift.

articles.title: Nu Republic launches Triphop smart backpacks in India, price starts at Rs 1,099
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Nu Republic has launched its Triphop Voyager Series, a new line of smart backpacks. The series includes five models with prices starting at Rs 1,099 and is available on Amazon.in, Blinkit, and Nu Republic's website.

articles.title: Which washing-up liquid comes top of the pots in test?
articles.author: Helen Mead
articles.summary: Procter & Gamble launched Fairy Liquid in 1950, which became popular in the UK. Recently, a test was conducted comparing Fairy Liquid with supermarket brands like Asda, Morrisons, Sainsbury's, Lidl W5, Aldi Magnum, and Tesco Original, evaluating their lather, grease-cutting ability, and scent.

articles.title: Pepsi Smart Can by PepsiCo Design and Innovation Wins Gold in A' Advertising Industry Awards
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: PepsiCo Design and Innovation's 'Pepsi Smart Can' has won a Gold A' Design Award. The 'Pepsi Smart Can' is a unique digital portal that allows personalized content and storytelling, fostering connections with diverse communities.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 Officially Unveiled at Qualcomm Event in China: Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Chipset and New Camera Design
articles.author: Deepu Mohan
articles.summary: OnePlus has unveiled the OnePlus 15, its new flagship phone powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. The phone features a new square camera module with the in-house DetailMax engine, replacing Hasselblad branding, and a 165Hz refresh rate display. Leaks suggest a 7,000mAh battery, 120W wired and 50W wireless fast charging, and a 50MP triple-camera setup.

articles.title: Amazon cloud boss scolds staff for slow product rollouts, says customers want launches not hype
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is prioritizing faster product launches, especially in AI and cloud spaces, to stay competitive. At the upcoming Reinvent event, AWS aims to launch products that customers can immediately use. Internally, AWS unveiled Quick, an agentic AI product designed to automate tasks and enhance productivity, for employee testing.

articles.title: OnePlus' latest concept phone changes color to 'breathe' with the user
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: OnePlus introduced its Concept One phone, featuring color-shifting glass that creates an 'invisible camera' effect on the rear. This concept showcased an innovative approach to phone design beyond standard updates.

articles.title: LBank Exchange Has Listed Aladdin Booster (WING)
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: LBank Exchange listed Aladdin Booster (WING) on September 25, 2025 (UTC), making the WING/USDT trading pair accessible to users.  Aladdin Booster is an ecosystem of productive AI agents, each engineered to deliver specific services or products.

articles.title: Test-Driving the 2025 Volkswagen GTI
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Volkswagen is releasing the Mark 8.5 2025 GTI. This revised version of the hot hatch aims to be a compelling do-everything vehicle.

articles.title: LG Adds Fresh Twist to the Laundry Experience in the UAE With Ai-powered, Energy-efficient Solutions
articles.summary: LG Electronics has introduced a range of AI-driven laundry solutions, including the WasherDryer Combo with Inverter HeatPump™ Technology and Direct Drive Motor. These products prioritize energy efficiency, superior fabric care, and user convenience, featuring AI-powered wash performance, microplastic care cycles, and advanced fabric protection technology. The new washers also feature Microplastic Care Cycle, a pioneering innovation that significantly reduces up to 60 percent of microplastics released from synthetic fibers during washing.

articles.title: Xiaomi 17 Pro Max Release Date, Price In India, Specifications, Design, Camera, Colours And More
articles.summary: Xiaomi has launched its Xiaomi 17 series in China, including the Xiaomi 17 Pro Max, which features a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset and HyperOS 3. The Pro Max model boasts a 6.9-inch LTPO OLED display, a secondary 2.9-inch rear screen, a triple 50-megapixel camera setup tuned by Leica, and a 7500 mAh battery with 100W wired and 50W wireless charging; the price starts at CNY 5,999.

articles.title: Viral Video Of Smart Office Water Cooler With Customisable Flavours Wows Internet
articles.author: NDTV Food Desk
articles.summary: Bevi introduced a smart water cooler system that dispenses filtered still, sparkling, and flavored water. The system eliminates the need for single-use plastic bottles and cans. The video of the Bevi system went viral, receiving positive reactions from viewers.

articles.title: Best Lipsticks to Shop on Myntra for Long-Lasting Glam
articles.summary: A collection of new lipsticks are available, including a lightweight matte mini lipstick for hydration, a glitter lipstick with matte finish for glamorous occasions, a soft nude matte lipstick for long-lasting comfort, a unique pH lipstick that transforms color, and a velvety matte mauve lipstick for daily elegance. These products are presented with descriptions of their features and intended uses.

articles.title: Papa John's is finally launching its cheese stuffed crust across the whole of the US. With a promo code, it's $12 for a large single-topping pizza.
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Papa John's is launching its Epic Stuffed Crust pizza nationwide on December 28, with early access for Papa Rewards members starting December 21. The large one-topping pizza costs $12 with the promo code "STUFFED." This marks only the second crust variant in the company's history, following the garlic parmesan crust launched in 2019.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5G Unveiled in India: Discover Pricing, Features, and Exclusive Design 2025
articles.summary: OnePlus officially released its newest mobile phone, the OnePlus Nord 5G, in India. The OnePlus Nord 5G features a 120Hz AMOLED display and is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 780G chipset. It is priced at INR 28,999 and will be available next month through the official OnePlus website and authorized retail partners.

articles.title: Verizon to be the first carrier to offer the new AI-powered Meta Ray-Ban Display glasses  Sep. 26, 2025 04:56
articles.summary: Verizon will be the first wireless carrier to offer the new Meta Ray-Ban Display AI glasses, featuring a full-color, high-resolution in-lens display with AI-powered features. The Meta Ray-Ban Display will be available for purchase at select Verizon stores starting this Fall, with in-person demos available for customers.

articles.title: ROG Xbox Ally Preorders Live, I Can't Afford One
articles.author: Zak Wojnar
articles.summary: Pre-orders are now live for the ROG Xbox Ally S, priced at $600, and the ROG Xbox Ally X, priced at $1000. The ROG Xbox Ally X is described as a powerful device with added Xbox support. The specs can be found on GameSpot.

articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy Buds Pro leak confirms Apple-like surround sound feature
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch a fourth model of Galaxy Buds earphones called 'Buds Pro'. This new model will join the existing Galaxy Buds line, which includes the original Buds, Buds+, and Buds Live. The Buds Pro will be the successor of Buds Live model, which is Samsung's first product with active noise cancellation (ANC).

articles.title: OnePlus 15 Unveiled in Poland: Detailed Specifications Revealed
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: OnePlus is preparing to launch the OnePlus 15, equipped with the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor and a DetailMax Engine for enhanced photography. The device will operate on OxygenOS and feature an advanced cooling system. It may also feature a substantial 7000 mAh battery and a 165 Hz refresh rate display.

articles.title: NioCorp Announces Commencement of Proposed Public Offering of Common Shares
articles.summary: NioCorp intends to use the net proceeds from the Offering for working capital and general corporate purposes, including to advance its efforts to launch construction of the Elk Creek Project and move it to commercial operation. The Elk Creek Project is expected to produce niobium, scandium, and titanium. NioCorp is also evaluating the potential to produce several rare earths from the Elk Creek Project.

articles.title: ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X Now Available for Pre-Order in Canada
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: ROG is launching the new ROG Xbox Ally & Ally X handhelds in Canada, with pre-orders starting from C$799. These handhelds, built in collaboration with Xbox, offer enhanced performance and a new user interface.

articles.title: Samsung Display promotes NCSOFT's new game title at Japanese exhibition
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Samsung Display Co. launched a joint program.

articles.title: Brewtiful Coffee Launches Premium Small-Batch Coffee Brand with Fast Processing and Fresh Delivery Commitment
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: BrewtifulCoffee.us, a new specialty coffee company, is launching with ethical sourcing partnerships and an innovative roast-to-order model. They are revolutionizing the coffee experience by ensuring beans reach customers at peak freshness through this process.

articles.title: Hands-On: Xiaomi 17 Pro Max With Dual Screens, Snapdragon 8 Elite 5
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Xiaomi is launching a new phone featuring industry firsts. The phone's name is considered unoriginal.

articles.title: Xbox Ally & Asus ROG Ally: $999 Preorders Open!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Microsoft has introduced the Xbox Ally and Ally X, portable gaming PCs, with starting prices of $599 and $999 respectively. The Ally X, aimed at enthusiasts, features a more powerful processor, while both models offer a customized Windows build designed for a controller-first experience, potentially reshaping the PC gaming landscape by merging portability and accessibility.

articles.title: Xbox Handhelds Will Be More Expensive Than You Thought
articles.author: The Hollywood Reporter
articles.summary: ROG is launching two new products, ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X, on October 16th. The launch introduces these new gaming devices to the market.

articles.title: ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X Now Available for Pre-Order in Canada
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: ROG Xbox Ally X and ROG Xbox Ally pre-orders will begin on September 25, 2025, at 8:00 p.m. ET in select regions. These new models will feature AMD Ryzen AI Z2 Extreme and Z2 A processors to provide enhanced gaming experiences and better battery life.

articles.title: Hype: The Egyptian AI Hangout App Built by Users
articles.summary: Hype, an AI-powered app for real-world hangouts, has been downloaded over 2,000 times in Egypt after its debut at RiseUp Summit. The app is developing Hype Wallet to provide venues and brands a data-driven loyalty and engagement tool, integrating community and commerce.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 officially unveiled with Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC and 165Hz display: Here's ...
articles.author: Live Mint
articles.summary: OnePlus unveiled the OnePlus 15. The OnePlus 15 features the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor and a new squarish camera design.

articles.title: Last year's Samsung smart watch tech shoppers call 'perfect' drops by �100
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Samsung is offering a £100 discount on last year's model of their smart watch.

articles.title: A $1,000 Xbox Ally handheld tests the appetite for pricey next-gen consoles
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Microsoft announced the launch date of its first Asus-powered handhelds, the Xbox Ally X. The prices were expected to be too high, and it was hoped Microsoft would subsidize them.

articles.author: Courier Traveler
articles.summary: GUNSENS announced the debut of its new product.

articles.title: I used The Sims 4 Adventure Awaits to re-create Love Island, and this expansion is ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: The Sims 4 released a new product, an expansion pack called "Adventure Awaits." The user tested the latest expansion pack.
